actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

official_title: To amend the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act to clarify the maintenance of effort requirement for local educational agencies.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Amends the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act to allow local educational agencies (LEAs) that receive federal assistance for the education of disabled children under the Act to reduce their spending for the education of such children if that reduction is attributable to reductions in their spending for employment related benefits for special education personnel.

titles.title: To amend the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act to clarify the maintenance of effort requirement for local educational agencies.
